summary: The script defines a PyTorch Lightning module for a simple MNIST classifier and uses a command‑line interface to train, validate, and test the model on Habana Gaudi HPUs, integrating the HPU precision plugin and the standard MNIST data module.
business_intent: Showcase how to deploy and benchmark a basic deep‑learning model on Habana hardware using PyTorch Lightning, helping developers adopt HPU acceleration for their AI workloads.
